Name: Blade Flash Death
About the game: Control your samurai by manipulating the timeline. Be diligent with each movement you make. When ready, press play and watch the scene unfold. If you've thought-out your movements carefully, you will be the last samurai standing. This is our little art game, Blade Flash Death. It's a small passion project that we wanted to share with whoever is interested in this extremely niche idea. You play the game by manipulating the timeline. Each frame of the timeline represents 1 second of combat in the game Move your character around the scene to defeat your enemies You can throw a dagger, play the scene, stop the scene or remove your last frame of the timeline When you're ready, press the play button and watch your scene unfold.
